Every public match has a little something different to experience and I'm having a great time. Pleasantly surprised that I like playing survivor more, dig the camaraderie. Or rivalry depending on what's happening. Chill killers are are the bandages keeping my day-to-day together. Happy Entity serving y'all.

O jogo é super divertido para jogar entre amigos. Porém, ainda conta com diversos bugs diferentes que atrapalham, e muito, a jogabilidade do game.
Buffs nos killers acontecem constantemente, atrapalhando a jogabilidade dos survivors. Porém, ainda assim é um jogo legal para jogar em algum servidor do Discord com amigos.
Тупые Русофобы, горите в аду. Игры вне политики, да да... Погнали накруичвать аккаунты а эпике, чтобы эта контора пидорасов пососала огромный жирный член. Стадники и лицемеры!
Buen juego, muchos momentos de adrenalina y frustraciones...
Great fun murdering your friends lmao.

Совсем недавно, видимо в один из патчей, как то был изменен принцип работы клиент-сервер. Если раньше +- пинг не особо влиял на игру, бывали хиты сумашедшие у всех, то теперь, если у тебя 150 пинг это просто ад, ты не можешь попасть ничем. Ни дать хит, ни скинуть палетку, ни использовать орех просто невозможно. На своем экране ты это делаешь, все проходит, анимация, звуки, даже счетчик бладпоинтов засчитывает тебе действие, но серверу теперь на это похуй, он так не считает.
i love it even tho i'm bad lmao

這版本的修機速度實在是太離譜了= =毀滅開場1分鐘直接被拆，就算帶上不死頂多多活30秒，光是抓到第一個人就很有可能被修2~3台，到了紅段要求更是嚴格，打保守不加分打激進被四逃，找到第一個人後只要他不白癡，一直翻版就要耗掉不少時間，最近看各個實況主也都是類似的處境，而且之後人類也要出圖騰技???問號???鬼都要抓不完了還要去處理你那白癡圖騰????只求官方大幅調高修機時間，不然就是讓鬼跟各個物件互動速度變快。還有最大的問題，垃圾地圖，真的懷疑官方人員全是專玩人的，從來都沒體驗過鬼的體驗，哈登菲爾德、拉昆市真的是拉基中的拉基，完全傾像人類的糞圖。我實在無法想像鬼的體驗在更糟會長怎樣，請不要再nerf鬼了，說實在的每隻鬼都很有特色，但要在這環境玩有些肯定是會被淘汰掉的，毀滅出場率過高被改爛那怎麼不說說有些鬼的出場率不高怎不改強點???媽的雙標仔。
總之你要玩這遊戲也只能爽前期了，請三思後再做決定。
jest spoko tylko opymalizacja czasem lubi sac

В каждой игре читер! В КАЖДОЙ ИГРЕ ЧИТЕР!!! Как вам ещё намекнуть, что в каждой игре читер???
У игры были бы плюсы, как и у читеров мозги но если честно у читеров нет мозгов, а у игры плюсов. Секундочку.... вы еще играете? Значит вы или читер или у вас нет мозгов. Если у вас нет мозгов значит вы читер. Вы всё ещё играете а значит в каждой игре читер! Это если честно не уважение к трудам разработчиков игры, они же стараются делать всякую хрень, от которой игра становится только хуже... А знаете что, пусть читеры и разработчики играют друг с другом, будет забавно... И может тогда что-то поменяется (НЕТ)
Before I played this game I had a big penis, two girlfriends, and a lot of will to live. None of these things have changed, so I have no idea if this game is good.

It is a good game but the average person would not like it for reasons I'll explain in detail. Well lets start off with what the game got right, the character designs are very good and first person play is a new feature in this genre ive never experienced in any other games like this. The maps are very good in that they have good graphics plus the game  has kept my attention up until now so it is fun in short bursts.

The unfortunate negatives of the game does out weigh the positives and let me get to my first issue with gameplay and that is people have been using the unrealistic gaming mechanics to evade/dodge when you play as a monster. When my opponents are in arms reach I should be able to grab them and either toss or slam or whatever attack so they don't run up to you where you just look stupid not being able to do anything. I have been fairly successful in most of the game sessions I had only because Im somewhat good at aiming and striking but the average joe might get 1 or 2 hits in before the opposition exit the map which is another problem I'd like to address and that is if you get a group of people who just fix the generators and exit the map easily, you lose your tokens or whatever and have to build points up to get a certain thing off the blood web again, it ends the game which the whole point of the game is survival not escaping in 2 minutes. If you are gonna make people sprint almost as fast as I can walk Its pretty easy for them to gather the things they need and win the level, they need to be longer or add a second part to the map.  I don't mind losing or being bested but short matches don't win you new players. I hate that you cant perform executions and have to buy them off the bloodweb and you use them once which is stupid cause in Friday the 13th you got 4 different choices of execution to choose from  for free! but I get 2 attacks and thats about it? Mind you ive only played with Nemesis but in my defense after 12 hours of gaming I had nothing but the same attacks meaning I played the same way 12 hrs straight with no new ways to play. The hook idea is okay but theres gotta be more thought put into the game other thank hooking people. This game may die out because it is lack luster, no menu options for what you can do just be a killer or victim, It takes forever to upgrade or earn anything and if there are more things in the game then thats a fail cause after 12 hours of playing thats
 to long of a wait. I'm done with the game now but what would help the game is this

1: Include a grab or grapple at close range
2: Add executions, don't lock them, earn the better executions by playing
3: Slow the speed of people down a notch cause they a swerving faster than the speed of light
4: Add weapons for monsters and survivors
5: When playing against pro survivors make it hardcore mode for them, no med-kits, no perks, 2 or 3 maps to go through before escape
6: For Nemesis do make a 2nd form, creative attacks other than a punch and tentacle strike. 
7: Last but not least I would like to be able to hit people into objects or walls and be able to go through them as Nemesis mutates. 

This list will probably not be considered but I urge you include 1 in cause that goes a long way! Thanks for reading, hope to see better quality in this game next time around.

So i've played 1,000 + hours on this game and let me tell you it's a great game! You can play as many different survivors or killers from your favorite scary movies. There are tons of fun perks to mess around with to create fun new builds for your favorite killers or survivors. I'm a killer main but you might prefer playing with your friends as a survivor.  When you get to higher ranks it can be frustrtating going against really good groups of survivors or going against a killer who face camps you when they hook you but all in all outstanding game graphically and game play wise
Desbalance absurdo muy a favor de los supervivientes en premade. El nuevo MMR arruino el juego.
